sqlMap.statement: SELECT SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SO.WH_CD ,CCC.S80_CMPY_CD ,SO.SO_NUM ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO.PICK_TKT_NUM ,SO.CUST_ISS_PO_NUM ,SO.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,SO.BILL_TO_CUST_CD ,CASE WHEN SO.DROP_SHIP_FLG='Y' THEN '999999' ELSE SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD END SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,SOT.S80_ORD_TP_CD ,SOT.S80_TRX_CD ,OSC.S80_ORD_SRC_CD ,NVL(SO.EXPT_SHPG_METH_CD, SVC.S80_SHIP_VIA_CD) SO_SHIP_VIA_CD ,NVL(SM.SHPG_METH_NM, SSV.S80_SHIP_VIA_NM) SHIP_VIA_DESC_TXT ,SO.SO_CRAT_TS ,SO.PSD_DT ,SO.RDD_DT ,SO.DNLD_TM_TS ,STC.S80_SHPG_TERM_CD ,SST.S80_SHPG_TERM_NM ,SO.CARR_CD ,SO.DROP_SHIP_FLG ,SO.PRINT_SCC_LB_FLG ,SO.PRINT_UCC_LB_FLG ,SO.MIX_PLT_ALLW_FLG ,SO.PRINT_PLT_UCC_LB_FLG ,SO.PRINT_NON_ASN_UCC_LB_FLG ,SO.ASN_REQ_FLG ,NVL(SO.UCC_NUM_CD, '1') IND_UCC_NUM_FLG ,SO.EDI_TP_CD ,SO.CUST_STORE_NUM ,SO.SO_DEPT_NUM ,SO.TOT_SHIP_AMT ,( SELECT SUM(NVL(D.TOT_SHPG_WT, 0)) FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL D WHERE D.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.SO_NUM=SO.SO_NUM AND D.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) TOT_WT_AMT_NUM ,SO.RTRN_LB_CD ,SO.SO_CONFIG_FLG ,SO.CARR_ACCT_NUM ,NVL(SO.SCHD_DELY_DT, SO.RDD_DT) WMS_SCHD_DELY_DT ,NVL(SO.CARR_CD, SO.VND_CD) WMS_CARR_CD ,SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,( SELECT CASE WHEN CNT>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MDSE M, SHPG_ORD_DTL D WHERE M.RTRN_REQ_PRT_FLG='Y' AND M.GLBL_CMPY_CD=D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND M.MDSE_CD=D.MDSE_CD AND D.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.SO_NUM=SO.SO_NUM AND M.EZCANCELFLAG='0' AND D.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) ) RTRN_ITEM_INCL_FLG ,SO.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,SO.PRE_ISTL_SHOP_RQST_FLG ,( SELECT CASE WHEN CNT<=0 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WMS_INBD_SO_HDR H WHERE H.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND H.WMS_SO_ID=SO.SO_NUM AND H.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) ) STAGE_ACT_CD ,SO.WMS_RTE_PATH_CD ,SOT.SCE_ORD_TP_NM ,SO.SRC_ORD_NUM ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,SHIP.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,SHIP.CTY_ADDR SHIP_CTY_ADDR ,SHIP.ST_CD SHIP_ST_CD ,SHIP.POST_CD SHIP_POST_CD ,SHIP.CTRY_CD SHIP_CTRY_CD ,SHIP.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM SHIP_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM ,SHIP.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM SHIP_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,SELL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 SELL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,SELL.CTY_ADDR SELL_CTY_ADDR ,SELL.ST_CD SELL_ST_CD ,SELL.POST_CD SELL_POST_CD ,SELL.CTRY_CD SELL_CTRY_CD ,SELL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM SELL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM ,SELL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM SELL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,BILL.SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 BILL_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,BILL.CTY_ADDR BILL_CTY_ADDR ,BILL.ST_CD BILL_ST_CD ,BILL.POST_CD BILL_POST_CD ,BILL.CTRY_CD BILL_CTRY_CD ,BILL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM BILL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_NM ,BILL.CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM BILL_CTAC_PTNR_PSN_TEL_NUM ,NVL(TL.TPL_LOC_NM, SO.WH_CD) AS TPL_LOC_NM ,( SELECT SUM(NVL(D.SHPG_QTY, 0)) FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL D WHERE D.GLBL_CMPY_CD=SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.SO_NUM=SO.SO_NUM AND D.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) ORIG_ORD_QTY_TXT ,PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD ,CASE WHEN PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD = '1001' AND SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = '12' THEN 'CPU' WHEN PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD = '1001' AND SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD != '12' THEN 'LOC' WHEN PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD = '1002' AND SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = '12' THEN 'CPU' WHEN PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD = '1002' AND SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD != '12' THEN 'H3P' ELSE 'H3P' END AS SVC_TP_CD ,STC_FROM.LOC_NUM AS FR_SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_01 ,STC_FROM.ADDL_LOC_NM AS FR_SHIP_SO_CUST_LINE_LOC_NM_02 ,STC_FROM.FIRST_LINE_ADDR AS FR_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_01 ,STC_FROM.SCD_LINE_ADDR AS FR_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_02 ,STC_FROM.THIRD_LINE_ADDR AS FR_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_03 ,STC_FROM.FRTH_LINE_ADDR AS FR_SO_CUST_LINE_ADDR_04 ,STC_FROM.CTY_ADDR AS FR_CTY_ADDR ,STC_FROM.ST_CD AS FR_ST_CD ,STC_FROM.POST_CD AS FR_POST_CD ,STC_FROM.CTRY_CD AS FR_CTRY_CD FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,CMPY_CD_CONV CCC ,SCE_ORD_TP SOT ,ORD_SRC_CONV OSC ,SHPG_METH SM ,SHIP_VIA_CONV SVC ,S80_SHIP_VIA SSV ,SHPG_TERM_CONV STC ,S80_SHPG_TERM SST ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL SHIP ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL SELL ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL BILL ,RTL_WH RW ,TPL_LOC TL ,PRCH_REQ PR ,SHIP_TO_CUST STC_FROM WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SO.WMS_DROP_FLG = 'N' AND SO.WMS_DROP_RQST_FLG = 'Y' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO.WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD AND RW.WH_SYS_TP_CD = #WH_SYS_TP_CD# AND RW.WH_OWNR_CD = #WH_OWNR_CD# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD = SOT.SCE_ORD_TP_CD(+) AND SOT.INBD_OTBD_CD(+) = #INBD_OTBD_CD# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OSC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_SRC_TP_CD = OSC.TRX_SRC_TP_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.EXPT_SHPG_METH_CD = SM.SHPG_METH_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SVC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = SVC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD(+) AND SVC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SVC.S80_SHIP_VIA_CD = SSV.S80_SHIP_VIA_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.FRT_CHRG_TO_CD = STC.FRT_CHRG_TO_CD(+) AND SO.FRT_CHRG_METH_CD = STC.FRT_CHRG_METH_CD(+) AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SST.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND STC.S80_SHPG_TERM_CD = SST.S80_SHPG_TERM_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHIP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SO_NUM = SHIP.SO_NUM(+) AND SHIP.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD(+) = #SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD_SHIP# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SELL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SO_NUM = SELL.SO_NUM(+) AND SELL.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD(+) = #SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD_SELL# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BILL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SO_NUM = BILL.SO_NUM(+) AND BILL.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD(+) = #SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD_BILL# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.WH_CD = TL.TPL_LOC_CD(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SRC_ORD_NUM = PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM(+) AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC_FROM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.WH_CD = STC_FROM.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CCC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SOT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND OSC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SM.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND SSV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SST.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SHIP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SELL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND BILL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND TL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SO.SO_NUM

SELECT SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOD.SO_NUM ,SOD.SO_SLP_NUM ,SOD.MDSE_CD ,SSCF.S80_STK_STS_CD ,SOD.CUST_MDSE_CD ,SOD.RQST_ORD_QTY ,SOD.SHPG_BAL_QTY ,SOD.SHPG_QTY ,SOD.UNIT_PRC_AMT ,SOD.DISC_PRC_AMT ,SOD.DISC_UNIT_PRC_AMT ,SOD.SER_NUM_TAKE_FLG ,SSCT.S80_STK_STS_CD S80_STK_STS_TO_CD ,SOD.SET_MDSE_CD ,SOD.SET_MDSE_NM ,SOD.SET_SHPG_QTY ,SOD.IN_EACH_QTY ,SOD.TOT_SHPG_WT ,SOD.TOT_SHPG_VOL ,SOD.BAT_NUM_TAKE_FLG ,SOD.CONFIG_ITEM_FLG ,SOD.RTL_WH_CD ,SOD.RTL_SWH_CD ,SOD.PICK_SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,SOD.BACK_ORD_IMPCT_TP_CD ,SOD.TRX_LINE_NUM ,SOD.RMV_CONFIG_FLG ,NVL(CD.ORD_QTY, SOD.RQST_ORD_QTY) ORIG_ORD_QTY ,PRD.RQST_RCV_DT || PRD.RQST_RCV_TM AS RQST_RCV_DT_TM FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL SOD ,STK_STS_CONV SSCF ,STK_STS_CONV SSCT ,CPO_DTL CD ,PRCH_REQ_DTL PRD WHERE SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SOD.SO_NUM = #SO_NUM# AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSCF.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.FROM_STK_STS_CD = SSCF.STK_STS_CD(+) AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.TO_STK_STS_CD = SSCT.STK_STS_CD(+) AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.TRX_HDR_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SOD.TRX_LINE_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM(+) AND SOD.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM(+) AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SOD.PRCH_REQ_NUM = PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM(+) AND SOD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM = PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM(+) AND SOD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM = PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM(+) AND SOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SSCF.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SSCT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOD.SO_NUM ,SOD.SO_SLP_NUM

SELECT SOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOM.SO_NUM ,SOM.SO_MSG_TP_CD ,SOM.TXT_SQ_NUM ,SOM.SO_MSG_DESC_TXT FROM SHPG_ORD_MSG SOM WHERE SOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SOM.SO_NUM = #SO_NUM# AND SOM.SO_MSG_TP_CD = #SO_MSG_TP_CD# AND SOM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SOM.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SOM.SO_NUM ,SOM.SO_MSG_TP_CD ,SOM.TXT_SQ_NUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TC.TPL_CARR_CD ,TC.TPL_SVC_LVL_CD ,TC.TPL_CARR_NM ,TC.TPL_SVC_LVL_NM ,TC.TPL_SPCL_SVC_NM FROM TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL TC WHERE TC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND TC.WH_OWNR_CD = #WH_OWNR_CD#
AND TC.CARR_CD = #CARR_CD#
AND TC.CARR_CD IS NULL
AND TC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = #SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD#
AND TC.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD IS NULL
AND TC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TC.TPL_CARR_SVC_LVL_SORT_NUM ) WHERE ROWNUM<=1

SELECT PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM ,PR.PRCH_REQ_TP_CD ,PR.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,PR.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,PR.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR ,PR.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,PR.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,PR.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR ,PR.SHIP_TO_ST_CD ,PR.SHIP_TO_POST_CD ,PR.SHIP_TO_CTRY_CD ,PR.DELY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,( SELECT SUM(D.ORD_QTY) FROM PRCH_REQ_DTL D WHERE D.GLBL_CMPY_CD=PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.PRCH_REQ_NUM=PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM AND D.EZCANCELFLAG='0' ) ORIG_ORD_QTY_TXT ,PR.CTAC_PSN_NM FROM PRCH_REQ PR WHERE PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND PR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND EXISTS ( SELECT PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM FROM PRCH_REQ_DTL PRD ,PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS PRLS WHERE PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM = PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_REL_STS_CD = #PRCH_REQ_REL_STS_CD# AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_TP_CD = #PRCH_REQ_LINE_TP_CD# AND PRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_CD = PRLS.PRCH_REQ_LINE_STS_CD AND PRLS.OPEN_STS_FLG = #OPEN_STS_FLG# AND PRLS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) ORDER BY PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM

SELECT PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM ,PRD.SRC_RTL_WH_CD ,PRD.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,PRD.CARR_CD ,PRD.MDSE_CD ,PRD.ORD_QTY ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_QTY ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_REL_QTY ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_BAL_QTY ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_INSRC_QTY ,PRD.DEST_RTL_WH_CD FROM PRCH_REQ_DTL PRD WHERE PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM = #PRCH_REQ_NUM# AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_TP_CD = #PRCH_REQ_LINE_TP_CD#
AND PRCH_REQ_REL_STS_CD = #PRCH_REQ_REL_STS_CD#
AND PRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ASC

SELECT H.TPL_FROM_PTNR_ID ,H.TPL_TO_PTNR_ID ,H.REQ_DT_TM_TS_TXT ,H.ORD_ID_TXT ,H.CARR_CD ,H.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,H.TPL_ACCT_TXT ,H.TPL_LOC_TXT ,H.SHIP_NM_ALL_TXT ,H.SHIP_ADDR_ALL_TXT ,H.SHIP_CTY_TXT ,H.SHIP_ST_TXT ,H.SHIP_POST_TXT ,H.SHIP_CTRY_TXT ,H.SHIP_CTAC_NM_TXT ,H.SHIP_PHO_NUM_TXT ,H.ORD_CMNT_ALL_TXT ,H.ORIG_ORD_QTY_TXT ,H.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,H.SVC_TP_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_NM_ALL_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_ADDR_ALL_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_CTY_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_ST_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_POST_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_CTRY_TXT ,H.SHIP_FROM_CTAC_NM ,H.SHIP_FROM_PHO_NUM ,H.SHIP_FROM_CMNT_ALL_TXT ,D.QTY_ORD_TXT ,D.ITEM_CD_TXT ,D.ORD_LINE_TXT ,H.TPL_CARR_NM ,H.TPL_SVC_LVL_NM ,H.TPL_SPCL_SVC_NM
,H.SEGMENT_ID
FROM NLBI1410_01 H ,NLBI1410_02 D WHERE H.INTERFACE_ID = #INTERFACE_ID# AND H.TRANSACTION_ID = #TRANSACTION_ID# AND H.TRANSACTION_ID = D.TRANSACTION_ID AND H.SEGMENT_ID = D.SEGMENT_ID AND H.UNIT_ID = D.UNIT_ID AND H.TPL_LOC_TXT IS NOT NULL AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY H.ORD_ID_TXT, H.TPL_LOC_TXT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STC.LOC_NM ,STC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,STC.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,STC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,STC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,STC.CTY_ADDR ,STC.ST_CD ,STC.POST_CD ,STC.TEL_NUM ,STC.CTRY_CD FROM PRCH_REQ_DTL PRD ,SHIP_TO_CUST STC WHERE PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM = #PRCH_REQ_NUM# AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRD.DEST_INVTY_LOC_CD = STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ASC ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM ASC ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STC.LOC_NM ,STC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,STC.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,STC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,STC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,STC.CTY_ADDR ,STC.ST_CD ,STC.POST_CD ,STC.TEL_NUM ,STC.CTRY_CD FROM PRCH_REQ_DTL PRD ,SHIP_TO_CUST STC WHERE PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM = #PRCH_REQ_NUM# AND PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PRD.SRC_INVTY_LOC_CD = STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ASC ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_NUM ASC ,PRD.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD ,DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_DESC_TXT FROM DS_ORD_CATG DOC ,CPO C WHERE DOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = #CPO_ORD_NUM# AND DOC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY DOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD

SELECT SP.PSN_CD ,SP.PSN_FIRST_NM ,SP.PSN_LAST_NM FROM S21_PSN SP ,CPO C WHERE SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SP.PSN_CD = C.ADMIN_PSN_CD AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = #CPO_ORD_NUM# AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SP.PSN_CD

SELECT SP.PSN_CD ,SP.PSN_FIRST_NM ,SP.PSN_LAST_NM FROM S21_PSN SP ,PO P WHERE SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SP.PSN_CD = P.PO_SUBMT_PSN_CD AND P.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND P.PO_ORD_NUM = #PO_ORD_NUM# AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND P.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SP.PSN_CD

SELECT SP.PSN_CD ,SP.PSN_FIRST_NM ,SP.PSN_LAST_NM FROM S21_PSN SP ,PRCH_REQ PR ,( SELECT DISTINCT D.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,D.PRCH_REQ_NUM FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL D WHERE D.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND D.SO_NUM = #SO_NUM# AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) SOD WHERE SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SP.PSN_CD = PR.PRCH_REQ_RQST_BY_PSN_CD AND PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM = SOD.PRCH_REQ_NUM AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SP.PSN_CD

SELECT SP.PSN_CD ,SP.PSN_FIRST_NM ,SP.PSN_LAST_NM FROM S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,CPO C WHERE SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SP.PSN_CD = OFA.PSN_CD AND NVL(OFA.EFF_FROM_DT, #MIN_DATE#) <= #SALES_DATE# AND NVL(OFA.EFF_THRU_DT, #MAX_DATE#) >= #SALES_DATE# AND OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OFA.TOC_CD = C.SLS_REP_TOC_CD AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = #CPO_ORD_NUM# AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OFA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SP.PSN_CD

SELECT S.LOC_NM ,S.ADDL_LOC_NM ,S.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,S.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,S.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,S.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,S.FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT ,S.SCD_REF_CMNT_TXT ,S.CTY_ADDR ,S.ST_CD ,S.PROV_NM ,S.POST_CD ,S.CTRY_CD FROM SHIP_TO_CUST S WHERE S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND S.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = #SHIP_TO_CUST_CD# AND S.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 AS ML_TP ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_02 AS FL_ABEND FROM DS_COND_CONST DCC WHERE DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID = #DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_CD = #DS_COND_CONST_CD# AND DCC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
